section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
AstraZeneca is a member of the following organisations in Brussels which spend part of their time in defined activities: European Federation of Pharmaceutical Industries and Associations (EFPIA), European Biopharmaceutical Enterprises (EBE), American Chamber of Commerce to the EU (AmCham EU), Vaccines Europe (VE) and the European Alliance for Personalised Medicine (EAPM) 
 
Links to these Trade associations are: 
http://www.efpia.eu/ 
http://www.ebe-biopharma.eu/ 
http://www.vaccineseurope.eu/ 
http://www.euapm.eu/ 
http://www.amchameu.eu/
goals__remit: AZ is a global research-based biopharmaceutical company headquartered in the UK. Our skills and resources are focused on discovering, developing and marketing medicines for some of the world’s most serious illnesses, including cancer, diabetes, cardiovacular and respiratory disease. We employ over 59 000 people globally, with 15 000 involved in manufacturing, research and development and commercial activites throughout Europe.
